Text-Conv is a free application build using React js to change case of your input Text and it also tells you the no. of character and words your input text contains.

Features

  • Free to Use
  • Easy to Use
  • Easy Interaction
  • Dark Mode Enabled
  • Base Algorithm

Build and Maintained by

_Andrewbie

); }
